content.raw:
I think so. I meant for `include/dummy_rendering/`, `include/dumb_physics`, and `dumb_physics/` to be mock ignition-rendering and ignition-physics. They should be deleted as soon as the real ignition libraries are available.

Are you saying the two ECSystems should be renamed to not have the dumb/dummy prefix to allow them to incrementally become the real physics and rendering systems?
